DOC.brief_summary: Joint research ( quantitative qualitative methodology ) quasi-experimental design , before-after without control group evaluate pilot implementation Positive Parenting Program ( Triple P ) context primary health care Chile . The hypothesis program feasible acceptable Chilean population .
